curriculum.title: Curriculum
curriculum.description: Balanced and diverse, emphasizing STEM, humanities, and life skills to prepare students for the real world.

mentoring.title: Personalized Mentoring
mentoring.description: Our dedicated mentors guide each student on a journey of self-discovery, identifying strengths and tackling challenges head-on. With personalized attention, we help unlock every individual's full potential.

classrooms.title: Interactive Classrooms
classrooms.description: Our interactive classrooms are buzzing with discussions, creative brainstorming, and hands-on activities. It's a dynamic environment where curiosity leads the way.

counseling.title: Student Counseling
counseling.description: The teachers conduct classes while understanding the students' classroom requirements. They hold frequent counseling sessions for students and inform the parents, highlighting the support needed from them as well.
